extensionDescription.message: 显示/移除重复的书签、空文件夹或描述

titleButtonListExactDupes.message: (Re)calculate the list of exact bookmark dupes. Two bookmarks are considered to be exact dupes if their URLs is identical.
titleButtonListExactDupes.description: Explain that the list of exact bookmark dupes will be (re)calculated, and that exact dupes are those with identical URLs

titleButtonListSimilarDupes.message: (Re)calculate the list of similar bookmark dupes. Two bookmarks are considered to be similar dupes if their URLs match up to the first “?”.
titleButtonListSimilarDupes.description: Explain that the list of similar bookmasrk dupes will be (re)calculated, and that dupes are similar if their URLs match up to the first “?”

titleButtonListEmpty.message: (Re)calculate the list of empty folders. The result might falsely contain live bookmarks.
titleButtonListEmpty.description: Explain that the list of empty folders will be (re)calculated, and that the result might falsely contain live bookmarks

titleButtonListAll.message: (Re)calculate the list of all bookmarks for stripping descriptions. The list consists of those bookmarks with a nonempty URL.
titleButtonListAll.description: Explain that the list of all bookmarks will be (re)calculated for stripping descriptions and that it consists of those bookmarks with a nonempty URL

buttonMarkButFirst.message: 全部选中，除了每个组中第一项
buttonMarkButFirst.description: Button for marking all but first

titleButtonMarkButFirst.message: Additionally the first bookmark in each group will be unmarked.
titleButtonMarkButFirst.description: Explain that additionally the first bookmark in each group will be unmarked

buttonMarkButLast.message: 全部选中，除了每个组中最后一项
buttonMarkButLast.description: Button for marking all but last

titleButtonMarkButLast.message: Additionally the last bookmark in each group will be unmarked.
titleButtonMarkButLast.description: Explain that additionally the last bookmark in each group will be unmarked

buttonMarkButOldest.message: Mark all but oldest in each group
buttonMarkButOldest.description: Button for marking all but oldest

titleButtonMarkButOldest.message: Additionally the oldest bookmark in each group will be unmarked.
titleButtonMarkButOldest.description: Explain that additionally the oldest bookmark in each group will be unmarked

buttonMarkButNewest.message: Mark all but newest in each group
buttonMarkButNewest.description: Button for marking all but newest

titleButtonMarkButNewest.message: Additionally the newest bookmark in each group will be unmarked.
titleButtonMarkButNewest.description: Explain that additionally the newest bookmark in each group will be unmarked

titleButtonMarkAll.description: Explain that all bookmarks will be marked

titleButtonUnmarkAll.description: Explain that all bookmarks will be unmarked

titleSelectFolder.message: If a folder is selected corresponding buttons will appear for marking.
titleSelectFolder.description: Explain that selecting a folder will provide corresponding buttons for marking

buttonMarkFolder.description: Button for marking all of the selected folder

titleButtonMarkFolder.message: Mark all bookmarks from the selected folder.
titleButtonMarkFolder.description: Explain that all bookmarks of selected folder will be marked

buttonUnmarkFolder.description: Button for unmarking all of selected folder

titleButtonUnmarkFolder.message: Unmark all bookmarks from selected folder.
titleButtonUnmarkFolder.description: Explain that all bookmarks of selected folder will be unmarked

buttonMarkFolderOther.message: In groups with selected folder mark all but these
buttonMarkFolderOther.description: Button for marking all but selected folder in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderOther.message: Additionally the bookmarks from the selected folder will be unmarked.
titleButtonMarkFolderOther.description: Explain that all bookmarks of selected folder will be unmarked

buttonMarkFolderButFirst.message: In groups with selected folder unmark all others or first
buttonMarkFolderButFirst.description: Button for unmarking all but selected folder or first in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderButFirst.message: In groups with selected folder mark all bookmarks from that folder and unmark all others. If there are no others, unmark the first.
titleButtonMarkFolderButFirst.description: Explain that in groups with selected folder all bookmarks from that folder will be marked and all others unmarked; if there are no others, the first is unmarked

buttonMarkFolderButLast.message: In groups with selected folder unmark all others or last
buttonMarkFolderButLast.description: Button for unmarking all but selected folder or last in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderButLast.message: In groups with selected folder mark all bookmarks from that folder and unmark all others. If there are no others, unmark the last.
titleButtonMarkFolderButLast.description: Explain that in groups with selected folder all bookmarks from that folder will be marked and all others unmarked; if there are no others, the last is unmarked

buttonMarkFolderButOldest.message: In groups with selected folder unmark all others or oldest
buttonMarkFolderButOldest.description: Button for unmarking all but selected folder or oldest in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderButOldest.message: In groups with selected folder mark all bookmarks from that folder and unmark all others. If there are no others, unmark the oldest.
titleButtonMarkFolderButOldest.description: Explain that in groups with selected folder all bookmarks from that folder will be marked and all others unmarked; if there are no others, the oldest is unmarked

buttonMarkFolderButNewest.message: In groups with selected folder unmark all others or newest
buttonMarkFolderButNewest.description: Button for unmarking all but selected folder or newest in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderButNewest.message: In groups with selected folder mark all bookmarks from that folder and unmark all others. If there are no others, unmark the newest.
titleButtonMarkFolderButNewest.description: Explain that in groups with selected folder all bookmarks from that folder will be marked and all others unmarked; if there are no others, the newest is unmarked

titleButtonRemoveMarked.message: Marked bookmarks refer to those since you last pressed the button to calculate the list.
titleButtonRemoveMarked.description: Explain that bookmarks refer to those of last update of the list

buttonStripMarked.description: Button for stripping descriptions of marked bookmarks

titleButtonStripMarked.message: Stripping of descriptions will update the internal bookmark generation date. Moreover, it will move the bookmark to the location where it was since you last pressed the button to calculate this list.
titleButtonStripMarked.description: Explain the side effects that stripping updates the date of bookmarks and moves them to the location of the last calculation of the list

buttonStopRemoving.description: Button for emergency stop of bookmark removing

buttonStopStripping.description: Button for emergency stop of description stripping

checkboxFullUrl.message: Display URL in listing. In any case the URL will appear if you hover over the bookmark.
checkboxFullUrl.description: Checkbox for displaying URL in listing. Explain that the URL will appear as title anyway

checkboxExtra.description: Checkbox for displaying the URL tail (following “?”) in the similar matching listing

messageCount.description: Report specified number of marked bookmarks

messageExactMatchesGroups.description: Report specified numbers of exact matches and groups of all

titleMessageExactMatchesGroups.message: Two bookmarks are considered to be exact dupes if their URLs is identical.
titleMessageExactMatchesGroups.description: Explain that exact dupes are those with identical URLs

messageSimilarMatchesGroups.description: Report specified numbers of similar matches and groups of all

titleMessageSimilarMatchesGroups.message: Two bookmarks are considered to be similar dupes if their URLs match up to the first “?”.
titleMessageSimilarMatchesGroups.description: Explain that similar dupes are those whose URLs match up to the first “?”

messageEmpty.description: Report specified number of empty folders

titleMessageEmpty.message: The list might falsely contain live bookmarks.
titleMessageEmpty.description: Explain that the list might falsely contain live bookmarks

titleMessageAll.message: The list consists of those bookmarks with a nonempty URL.
titleMessageAll.description: Explain that the list consists of those bookmarks with a nonempty URL

messageRemoveMarked.description: Report that removal of marked bookmarks started

messageRemoveProgress.description: Report that specified number/total/percentage of bookmarks are removed

messageRemoveSuccess.description: Report success when removing specified number of bookmarks

messageRemoveError.message: 移除 $TOTAL$ 个书签时出错：$ERROR$
messageRemoveError.description: Report specified error after removing specified number of bookmarks

messageStripMarked.message: 剥离已选中书签的描述

messageStripProgress.description: Report that specified number/total/percentage of descriptions are stripped

messageStripSuccess.description: Report success when stripping specified number of descriptions

messageStripError.message: 剥离 $TOTAL$ 个描述时出错：$ERROR$
messageStripError.description: Report specified error after stripping specified number of descriptions
